item.title: With Moves on West Bank and Gaza City, Israel Defies Global Outcry
item.description: Israel approved new settlements in the occupied West Bank, while its troops have reached the outskirts of Gaza City. The developments raise questions ...

item.title: Israel Approves West Bank Settlements, a Blow to Palestinian Statehood Hopes
item.description: The long-stalled project near Jerusalem, known as E1, further fragments lands envisioned as a Palestinian state, advancing a goal of Israeli hard-line...

item.title: Gazans React to Israel’s Preparations to Take Over Gaza City
item.description: Palestinians expressed frustration on Wednesday over Israel’s announcement to call up tens of thousands of reservists for an operation to take control...

item.title: John Cruickshank, Last World War II Victoria Cross Winner, Dies at 105
item.description: He made a daring raid on a U-boat, suffered 72 wounds and helped land his damaged seaplane.

item.title: What Russia Is Doing to Grab Ukrainian Land While It Still Can
item.description: As negotiations over the war carry on, President Vladimir V. Putin is pushing hard with tactics that have evolved over three and a half years.
